chapter.text: 44|1|ha mim
44|2|sasil-eul balghyeojuneun i seongseoemaengsehamyeo
44|3|hananim-eun geugeos-eul chugbogbad-eun bam-e gyesihaessnani geugeos-eulo gyeong-goha goja ham-ila
44|4|geunal bam modeun jiheloun ildeul i myeongbaeghayeojini
44|5|hananim-ui myeonglyeong-ila sillo geubunkkeseo seonjijadeul-eul bonaessnola
44|6|geugeos-eun junim-eulobuteoui jabi la sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo asi neun bun-isila
44|7|neohuiga hwagsilhan mid-eum-eul gajil ttae geubun-eun haneulgwa daeji geuligo geusaie issneun manmul-ui junim-isila
44|8|geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo saeng myeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bundo geubun-eulo neohuiui junim-iyo ttohan neohui josang-ui junim-isila
44|9|geuleona geudeul-eun uisimhamyeo jolong hani
44|10|haneul-i jit-eun yeongilo gadeug chaneun geunal-eul geudaeneun jikyeobolila
44|11|yeongiga salamdeul-eul deop-eo gali uni gotongseuleoun beol-ila
44|12|bulsinjadeul-eun juyeo jeohuiege i beol-eul geodueo jusoseo jeohuiga mid gessnaida
44|13|geu gyohun-i geudeul-ege yuyongha gessneunyo jinlileul balghyeojuneun seonjijaga geudeul-ege imi imhasyeossdoda
44|14|geuleona geudeul-eun geulobuteo deung eul dollimyeo geuga michinjala malhadeo la
44|15|hananimkkeseo jamsi eungbeol-eul geo dueo jumyeon neohuineun dasi saagham-eu lo dol-agal geos-ila
44|16|gajang gyeoglyeolhan eungbeol-i iss-eul geunal hananim-eun gotongseuleoon beol-eul ga halila
44|17|hananim-eun geudeul ijeon-ui pala o baegseong-eul siheomhayeoss-euni hullyunghan seonjijaga geudeul-ege imhayeo
44|18|hananim-ui jongdeul-eul naege neomgyeo juo sillo naneun neohuiege on mid-eum ui seonjijala malhadeola
44|19|hananimkke geoyeoghamyeo omanhajimalla sillo naega bunmyeonghan neunglyeog-eul neo huiege boyeo julila
44|20|neohuiga naleul haechilyeo hal ttae naneun naui junim-imyeo neohui junim-in hananimkke guwon-eul cheonghalila
44|21|neohuiga naleul midji anihanda myeon naleul hollo dula
44|22|sillo ideul-eun joejieun baegseong-ib nida lago junimkke gidohadeola
44|23|ie daedab-i iss-eoss-eumae neohui ga chujeog-eul danghalini naui jongdeulgwa deobul-eo bam-e tteonala
44|24|badaneun gallajin chaelo dueola geudeul-eun igsahage doel mulideul-ila
44|25|geudeul-i namgin gwasuwongwa umul deul-i eolmana manh-eunyo
44|26|jeondabgwa hullyunghan hyusigcheowa
44|27|hyanglag-e tamnighaessdeon geu pung-yolo un jaemuldo
44|28|geuleohge hayeo kkeut-i nago ha nanim-eun igeosdeul-eul daleun baegseong-ege sangsogke haessnola
44|29|geudeul-eul wihae haneuldo ttangdo nunmul-eul heulliji anihaess-eumyeo geudeul-ege neun yuyedo eobs-eossnola
44|30|hananim-eun gul-yog-ui jaeang-eulo buteo iseula-el baegseong-eul guhayeoss-euni
44|31|palaolo buteola sillo geuneun omanhan joein-ila
44|32|hananim-eun jihyelosseo yeoleo min jogjung-eseo geudeul-eul seontaeghaeseo
44|33|geudeul-ege yejeungdeul-eul buyeoha yeoss-euni geu an-eneun bunmyeonghan siheom-i eossnola
44|34|ideul-eun malhadoda
44|35|uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon dasi buhwaldoeji anhnola
44|36|geuleomeulo neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon-uli seonjodeul-eul doedollyeo jula hani
44|37|geudeul-eun tubaui baegseong-gwa ijeon ui baegseongdeul boda ganghada saeng-gaghaneu nyo hananim-eun geudeul-i nah-eun joeag-eu lo malmiam-a geudeul-eul myeolmangke haessno la
44|38|hananimkkeseo cheonjileul changjohagogeu saie issneun modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun dansunhan olag-i anila
44|39|geugeosdeul-eul jinlilo changjohayeoss-eudoe geudeul daedasuneun ihaehaji mosha nola
44|40|sillo simpan-ui nal-eun geudeul modu leul wihae jeonghayeojin nal-ini
44|41|geunal-eun chinguga geuui chingue ge yuyonghaji anihago doumdo bad eul su eobsneun nal-ila
44|42|geuleona hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun janeun je-oela sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
44|43|sillo jakkumu namuga
44|44|joeindeul-ui eumsig-i doeeo
44|45|nog-eun soesmulcheoleom doeeo geudeul-ui wi sog-eseo kkeunh-eo oleuni
44|46|deulkkeulhneun tteugeoun mulgwa gatdeola
44|47|geuttae eumseong-i deullyeooni geuleul delyeoga taoleuneun buljiog-eulo neoh-eula
44|48|geuligo geuui meoli wieneun deulkkeulhneun mul-i bueojimyeo
44|49|igeos-eul masbola sillo neoyamal lo hullyonghago him-i sen jala
44|50|sillo igeos-i nega uisimhaessdeon geos-ila
44|51|geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun anjeon han gos-e issge doenani
44|52|nag-wongwa umuldeul-i issneun gos-ila
44|53|seomsehan silkeuwa bidan os-eul geolchigo seoloui eolgul-eul masboge doeli la
44|54|geuleohdeus eunhyeleul bepeulgo aleum dabgo nun-i keun baeujileul gyeolhabsikyeo juni
44|55|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo ongaj gwail eul pyeonghwalomge jeulgidoda
44|56|geudeul-eun hanbeon-ui jug-eum oeeneun dasi jug-eum-eul masboji anihamyeo ha nanim-eun taoleuneun buljiog-ui beollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinila
44|57|igeos-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeyo choegoui seunglila
44|58|hananim-eun kkulan-eul geudaeui eon eolo gyesihaessgeoneul ilo hayeo geudeul i gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
44|59|geuleomeulo geudaeneun gidalimyeo jikyeobola geudeuldo yeogsi gidaligo issnola
